definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

pinyin: gai4 nian4 yi1 cun2 mo2 xing2
gai4 nian4 qu1 dong4 jia1 gong1

sentences.english: The first part: to discuss the main concepts and characteristics of commercial subject.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章，主要介紹商主體的概念和特徵。

sentences.english: Use the concept map to promote dialogue and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 運用概念圖，促進對話與合作。

sentences.english: The positive self-concept will promote the individual mental health.
sentences.chinese: 積極的自我概念會促進個體的心理健康。

sentences.english: If we think about it, wind chill is an ill-defined concept.
sentences.chinese: 仔細想來，風寒是一個定義不清楚的概念。

sentences.english: My system is whatever's inside the box.
Jung's concept of the ego evolved over time.
sentences.chinese: 容格關於自我的概念是隨着時間而發展。

sentences.english: We will explore this concept in the next section.
sentences.chinese: 我們在接下來的部分探究這個概念。

sentences.english: Gibson has interviewed people to understand how they  conceptualize teams.
sentences.chinese: 吉布森調查了人們對於“團隊合作”這一概念的認識。

sentences.english: This is a superb concept. It should certainly be done.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種極好的概念，當然應該實施。

sentences.english: About gender and race differences in self-concept.
sentences.chinese: 自我概念上的性別差異和種族差異。

sentences.english: How can developers and landscape architects work with architects, engineers to bring enough part of the greening into our buildings?
sentences.chinese: 建築和景觀的共融形成了會呼吸的建築物的概念。

sentences.english: Now, another useful notion is the unit vector to the trajectory.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個有用的概念就是軌道的單位矢量。

sentences.english: This article verifies the basic concept of counter-intelligence activities.
sentences.chinese: 本文明確了當代反情報活動的基本概念。

sentences.english: Finally, elaborated the tax revenue drafts accepts relational the concept and the characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 最後，闡述了稅收徵納關係的概念和特徵。

sentences.english: Therefore, many notions that apply to rings and homomorphisms stem from geometric intuition.
sentences.chinese: 從而，環與同態中許多概念都源於幾何直覺。

sentences.english: This concept is one of the fundamental doctrines in Buddhism and Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 這一概念是佛教和印度教最基本的教義之一。
